# llms.txt - AI Search Engine Instructions for Power Choosers

# About Power Choosers
Power Choosers is a commercial energy procurement partner serving deregulated markets nationwide, including ERCOT (Texas), PJM, MISO, ISO-NE, and NYISO. We connect businesses with the best electricity and natural gas suppliers, handling energy agreements, contract negotiation, and ongoing support.

# Primary Services
- Energy Procurement: Finding and negotiating the best electricity rates for businesses
- Bill Management: Streamlined bill management and transparent reporting
- Efficiency & Sustainability: Expert advice on efficiency projects and renewables

# Key Pages
- Home: https://powerchoosers.com/
- About: https://powerchoosers.com/about.html
- Services: https://powerchoosers.com/services.html
- Resources: https://powerchoosers.com/resources.html
- Schedule Consultation: https://powerchoosers.com/schedule.html

# Tools & Resources
- TDU Delivery Charges Calculator: https://powerchoosers.com/tdu-delivery-charges.html
- 2026 Electricity Market Navigator: https://powerchoosers.com/guide-2026.html

# Geographic Focus
We serve businesses in deregulated energy markets:
- Texas (ERCOT): Houston, Dallas, and statewide commercial electricity and natural gas
- PJM: Mid-Atlantic and Midwest regions
- MISO: Upper Midwest
- ISO-NE: New England
- NYISO: New York

# Target Audience
Commercial businesses, manufacturers, facilities managers, CFOs, and operations directors seeking:
- Competitive commercial electricity rates
- Natural gas procurement
- Energy contract negotiation
- Bill analysis and optimization
- Demand charge management (Texas)
- Capacity charge optimization (PJM, MISO, ISO-NE, NYISO)

# Content Focus
Our content covers:
- Commercial electricity rates and market trends
- Energy procurement strategies
- Contract timing and renewal windows
- Demand charges and capacity charges
- TDU delivery charges (Texas)
- Energy efficiency and sustainability
- Market analysis and forecasts
